title: BlossomTune UI Configuration Schema
description: Schema for validating the blossomtune.yaml UI text configuration.

welcome_message_md.description: Message shown to welcome the user.

error_message_md.description: Message shown when an error occurs.

auth_required_md.description: Message shown when a user needs to log in.

hf_handle_empty_md.description: Error for an empty Hugging Face handle.

invalid_email_md.description: Error for an invalid email format.

federation_full_md.description: Message shown when no new participants can join.

activation_invalid_md.description: Error for an incorrect activation code.

registration_submitted_md.description: Confirmation after a user submits a join request.

missing_activation_code_md.description: Message prompting the user to enter their activation code.

status_approved_md.description: Message for an approved participant, including connection details. JINJA2: {{ participant_id }}, {{ partition_id }}, {{ superlink_hostname }}, {{ superlink_port }}, {{ num_partitions }}

status_pending_md.description: Status message for a request awaiting admin review.

status_denied_md.description: Message for a denied participant. JINJA2: {{ participant_id }}

participant_not_activated_warning_md.description: Admin warning when trying to approve a non-activated user.

partition_in_use_warning_md.description: Admin warning for an already assigned partition ID. JINJA2: {{ partition_id }}

auth_status_logged_in_owner_md.description: Auth status for the space owner. JINJA2: {{ profile.username }}

auth_status_logged_in_user_md.description: Auth status for a regular logged-in user. JINJA2: {{ profile.username }}

auth_status_not_logged_in_md.description: Auth status when the user is not logged in.

auth_status_local_mode_md.description: Auth status when running the app locally.
